title: Examples of presentations
text:
Here we can add links to presentations.
For now you can access the presentation by adjusting the URL below with your details
https://YOUR-GITHUB-ACCOUNT.github.io/NAME-OF-YOUR-GIT-REPO/tab-presentation/presentation1/presentation-example.html
Simply change my capitalized text for your: i) your github username
ii) the name of your github repo then copy the URL and paste it to visit the webpage.
The adjusted URL above should take you to an example of a simple Quarto presentation.

title: Data Insights
EndingLoneliness
text:
Loneliness is a growing societal issue, affecting mental well-being and productivity. Studies show that 1 in 3 adults experience loneliness, leading to increased stress, anxiety, and even health risks. Despite the rise of social media, meaningful connections remain difficult to build.
EndingLoneliness is a data-driven platform designed to combat loneliness through community engagement, real-time insights, and interactive support systems. By leveraging group calls, forum discussions, and emotional sentiment analysis, the platform helps users track their social engagement and emotional well-being, encouraging deeper connections.
Through AI-powered dashboards, personalized recommendations, and interactive analytics, EndingLoneliness provides measurable solutions to help individuals feel more connected and supported.

title: EndingLoneliness
text:
Loneliness is a growing societal issue, affecting mental well-being and productivity. Studies show that 1 in 3 adults experience loneliness, leading to increased stress, anxiety, and even health risks. Despite the rise of social media, meaningful connections remain difficult to build.
EndingLoneliness is a data-driven platform designed to combat loneliness through community engagement, real-time insights, and interactive support systems. By leveraging group calls, forum discussions, and emotional sentiment analysis, the platform helps users track their social engagement and emotional well-being, encouraging deeper connections.
Through AI-powered dashboards, personalized recommendations, and interactive analytics, EndingLoneliness provides measurable solutions to help individuals feel more connected and supported.

title: Course overview
text:
What is a Dashboard?

Dashboards provide a visual display of the most important information needed to achieve one or more objectives.
They consolidate and arrange information on a single screen.

Key Characteristics of Effective Dashboards

Clarity: Information should be easy to read and interpret.
Accuracy: Data must be accurate and up-to-date.
Relevance: Content should align with user goals and needs.

title: Course overview
text: Definition by Stephen Few

title: Course overview
text:
The Role of Visual Design

Minimize distractions and unnecessary elements.
Use consistent layouts and formatting.
Apply thoughtful use of color and typography.

Best Practices for Dashboard Design

Avoid clutter: Only display essential information.
Prioritize data: Highlight key metrics and KPIs.
Use visual hierarchy: Direct the viewerâ€™s focus to the most important elements.

title: Course overview
text:
Common Pitfalls to Avoid

Overloading the user with too much data.
Using overly complex or inconsistent designs.
Neglecting the importance of user testing.

What You Shoud Do

Focus on the needs and goals of the dashboardâ€™s end-users.
Iteratively test and refine designs to improve usability.

title: Course overview
text:
Summary

Dashboards are powerful tools for decision-making.
Effective dashboards balance clarity, relevance, and visual appeal.
Avoid common pitfalls by focusing on user needs and testing designs.
